## IDecoratorResolution.cache() method

Sets cached resolution flag. When resolved, resolution will be stored in cache

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cache(name?: string): WithDecoratorResolver;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | the name to be used to retrieve resolution form cache |

<b>Returns:</b>

`WithDecoratorResolver`

- an instance of [WithDecoratorResolver](./typeioc.withdecoratorresolver.md) interface
